name: Deep Blue Fantasy (itch)
description:
You are a lost robot on a journey discovering the lost civilization and trying to find your identity.

Notice: In the drawing puzzle, you CANNOT draw a line crossing another node.

Shaders are bought from the store - Toony Colors Pro 2.

Font - Splashextrabold.

All other work is original and finished in 3 days.

Controls: 

WASD + Mouse for Movement and Camera

F/Left Mouse for interaction

Credits: 

Artist/Designer: Yizhe Wu

Artist/Designer: Qingxiang Chen

Programmer/Designer: Haolun Zhang

Designer: Denghao Liu
